Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2017 02:48PM CrazyBC wrote: I had breast cancer 7 years ago and now am waiting on the final results that I have (likely) lymphoma. Reading on symptoms,a common symptom with lymphoma is very itchy skin. I have experienced a lot of hair loss over the last 6 months or so, enough that my first instinct was to have my thyroid tested. I don't see much about this symptom, but any stress on the body can cause hair loss, so I guess it makes sense. My blood work looks normal, even with a 5cm mass in my lung. Hang in there! Anxious to hear what you find ou
Posts.Title: Would BC in lymph nodes show up in routine blood work? dearrainy dearrainy

Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2017 09:04PM CrazyBC wrote: I have not had any itching. I HAVE lost 40 pounds since the beginning of this year, but I had decided to eliminate sugar, and, for the first time ever in my life, have been successful in a weight loss endeavor. Now I wonder how much of it was the sugar elimination and how much was the lymphoma! (I consumed a LOT of sugar, so I was not surprised by the amount of weight lost). My doctor has asked about night sweats--but I have have not really had those either, but I have been having some hot flash-type feelings. It is hard to wait to find out, isn't it? We sit and debate every symptom! Best wishes for tomorrow! Hope you get results quickly.
Posts.Title: Would BC in lymph nodes show up in routine blood work? dearrainy dearrainy
